sentences.en: "I just added a little soy sauce," he informs us.

sentences.en: Cook the sauce over a low heat until it boils and thickens.
sentences.cn: 以小火加热酱汁至其沸腾变浓。

sentences.en: It's a proper Christmas dinner, with turkey and bread sauce.
sentences.cn: 这是顿像样的圣诞大餐，有火鸡和牛奶沙司。

sentences.en: Just plop the noodles over the center of the sauce.
sentences.cn: 把面条轻放在调味汁中间就行了。

sentences.en: Make sure that your meal won't be smothered with white sauce.
sentences.cn: 千万不要把自己的饭菜上都涂满白汁沙司。

sentences.en: Norman cut open his pie and squirted tomato sauce into it.
sentences.cn: 诺尔曼切开自己的派，往里面挤了点番茄酱。

sentences.en: Pour a little of the sauce over the chicken.
sentences.cn: 在鸡肉上浇一点调味汁。

sentences.cn: 搅拌调味汁，把它浇在上面。

sentences.en: The patient can have apples, apple juice, apple sauce, and so forth.
sentences.cn: 病人可以食用苹果、苹果汁、苹果酱等。

sentences.en: The sauce is thick and rich so don't bother trying to diet.
sentences.cn: 这个酱汁又浓又香，别费劲节食了。

sentences.en: Transfer this sauce to a separate saucepan, if desired.

sentences.en: Turn the heat down so the sauce simmers gently.
sentences.cn: 将炉火调小，用文火炖调味汁。

sentences.cn: 把25克（即1盎司）黄油搅拌到酱汁里。
